name: Fruit Grab
description:
In this game, all you do is gather fruit and take them to their designated containers.

The respective Arrow Keys are used to move.

I made this game as a project of my college class I took. I decided to post this as a way to show what I created and to be able to look back on down the line. Because I had a lot of fun with this game, and had other ideas that I couldn't add due to time constraints, and with me gathering new skills, I plan to remake a newer and updated version of this game.
